data.title: LgrbWorldModel: Long-duration Gamma-Ray Burst World Model
data.name: grb_world
data.description: Containing codes for the SGRB and LGRB world models

evidence: "This repository contains data, codes, and the results for the analysis and modelling of BATSE Long and Short GRB samples."
"If you use any of the algorithms, codes or the results presented in this repository, we kindly ask you to cite the following two papers" (indicating research analysis software).

"Last updated: Thursday 1:14 PM, April 23 2015, by Amir Shahmoradi, Institute for Fusion Studies, The University of Texas at Austin" (single named maintainer; no mention of package managers or binaries, implying source-based use).
